section.heading: Distraint of goods and chattels authorized; levy and sale of land; advertisement of personal property sale; public auction; report and audit; disposition of surplus.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Section 410(e) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: “Section 406(b), (d), (f), (l), (n), (o), (r), (v), (x)through (aa), (cc), (ff), (gg), (ll), (pp), (vv), (ww), (aaa), (ccc), (eee), and (ggg) shall apply as of January 1, 2001.”
